title: Don't Forget About Manchester
posting_body: ['Lease TODAY!', 'Luxury Urban Living - Uptown Redefined', 'Located in the coveted Uptown State Thomas Neighborhood of Dallas, Texas, Manchester State Thomas offers something for everyone: spacious Townhouses, historic architecture of the Brownstones, and the contemporary style of the City View Flats.', 'These luxury apartments in Uptown Dallas give you the elegant and refined lifestyle you desire.', "Experience the State Thomas neighborhood's fusion of modern convenience with the old-world charm of the vibrant, walkable, and pet-friendly apartments in Uptown Dallas.",
